text: An octagon or 8-gon is a polygon that has exactly 8 sides. == Regular octagon == All sides of a regular octagon are the same length. Each corner is 135°. All corners added together equal 1080°. === Area === The amount of space a regular octagon takes up is :\text{Area} = 2(1+\sqrt{2})a^2. a is the length of one of its sides. Another way to write it is :\text{Area} = 2 a^2 (\sqrt{2} + 1). == Gallery == Image:Star_polygon_8-3.svg|This shape is called an octagram. It has one regular octagon in the middle. Image:Octagonal prism.png|The octagonal prism has 2 octagons in it: one on the top, and the other on the bottom. Image:Irregular_octagon.svg|A non-regular octagon Image:8-folding.svg|Making an octagon by folding paper ==Related pages== * Different types of polygons * Hexagon * Pentagon * Square or quadrilateral * Triangle 8
title: Octagon
